name: Sniper Hunting: Jungle Surviva
description:
Sniper Hunting: Jungle Survival is back with vengeance for the apes hunter in jungle environment. Shoot at dangerous crazy animals. Unleash skills for shooting as sniper shooter. Don't let the deer escape. It is time to load out your weapons and get your 5 star shooting fix!
- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- Dozens of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of lethal GUNS and WEAPONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
